#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main() {
    int max_level;
    scanf("%d", &max_level);

    // Read the x input
    int count_x;
    scanf("%d", &count_x);
    int* x = malloc(count_x * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < count_x; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &x[i]);
    }

    // Read the y input
    int count_y;
    scanf("%d", &count_y);
    int* y = malloc(count_y * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < count_y; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &y[i]);
    }

    // Check for presence of 0 in X or Y
    int is_zero_in_x = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_x; i++) {
        if (x[i] == 0) {
            is_zero_in_x = 1;
            break;
        }
    }

    int is_zero_in_y = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_y; i++) {
        if (y[i] == 0) {
            is_zero_in_y = 1;
            break;
        }
    }

    // Process X and Y to form processed arrays
    // Processed X
    int count_x_processed = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_x; i++) {
        if (is_zero_in_x && x[i] == 0) continue;
        count_x_processed++;
    }
    int* processed_x = malloc(count_x_processed * sizeof(int));
    int idx_x = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_x; i++) {
        if (!is_zero_in_x || x[i] != 0) {
            processed_x[idx_x++] = x[i];
        }
    }

    // Processed Y
    int whether_exclude_y_zero = (is_zero_in_y && !is_zero_in_x);
    int count_y_processed = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_y; i++) {
        if (whether_exclude_y_zero && y[i] == 0) continue;
        count_y_processed++;
    }
    int* processed_y = malloc(count_y_processed * sizeof(int));
    int idx_y = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_y; i++) {
        if (!whether_exclude_y_zero || y[i] != 0) {
            processed_y[idx_y++] = y[i];
        }
    }

    // Create combined array
    int total = count_x_processed + count_y_processed;
    int* combined = malloc(total * sizeof(int));
    int pos = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < count_x_processed; i++) {
        combined[pos++] = processed_x[i];
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < count_y_processed; i++) {
        combined[pos++] = processed_y[i];
    }

    // Find maximum number and count unique elements
    int max_num = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < total; i++) {
        if (combined[i] > max_num) {
            max_num = combined[i];
        }
    }
    if (max_num < 0) { // handle possible negative numbers, but assuming not needed
        max_num = 0;
    }

    int* present = calloc(max_num + 1, sizeof(int));
    if (!present) {
        free(processed_x);
        free(processed_y);
        free(combined);
        printf("Oh, my keyboard!");
        return 0;
    }

    int count_unique = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < total; i++) {
        int num = combined[i];
        if (num < 0 || num > max_num) continue; // skip out-of-bound numbers
        if (!present[num]) {
            present[num] = 1;
            count_unique++;
        }
    }

    // Determine the outcome
    if (count_unique == max_level) {
        printf("I become the guy.\n");
    } else {
        printf("Oh, my keyboard!\n");
    }

    // Clean up all allocations
    free(x);
    free(y);
    free(processed_x);
    free(processed_y);
    free(combined);
    free(present);

    return 0;
}
